spotlight.title: Nicole Lopez
spotlight.description: For the Mandala project in Jasonâ€™s NMD Animation class, I wanted to emit a simple, calm feeling through use of elementary circles, rounded forms, and whitespace that help describe who I am- relatively laid-back, organized, and (hopefully) unintimidating to name a few.

spotlight.title: Morgan Merrick
spotlight.description: This redesign was intended to streamline the process of exploring new and unfamiliar travel destinations while improving the overarching visual style." - Morgan Merrick

spotlight.title: Rohan Pawar
spotlight.description: I wanted to capture the mood of Swiss Army Man with fun illustrations and subtle humor. It was fun to trying to breathe life into a flat illustrative style.

spotlight.title: Jaymart Yabo
spotlight.description: My goal for this project was to create a fun, colorful bumper to invite the community to a day of innovation and creativity

spotlight.title: Alex Kauffman
spotlight.description: Our first project for NMDE 3D was to create an object of our choice. I chose something that is complicated to help really learn Cinema 4D software to give myself a head start.
